name: Sid Meier's Civilization
description: Archived version. During the game's DOS installation, pick the options 1, then 4 and 1 again.

files.civ-archive: N/A:Select the archive containing Civilization's install files. It can be downloaded as abandonware.

content:
dosbox:
  aspect: true
  scaler: normal2x
  windowed: true
files:
- civ-archive: N/A:Select the archive containing Civilization's install files. It
    can be downloaded as abandonware.
installer:
- extract:
    file: civ-archive
main_file: CIV.EXE
